sentences.sContent: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.

sentences.sContent: The new plane is in its final design stage.
sentences.sCn: 这种新型飞机正处于最后的设计阶段。

sentences.sContent: the design for the new sports centre
...They help them become aware of design and technique...

...computer-aided design has become essential but in some ways has cheapened the design process...
...exemplified how far green design has come...
...she might provide technical details on such topics as the design of spacesuits that protects spacemen from the deadly temperature extremes of space...
